## Featured Projects

### GNX-CLI
- **Description**: The Next-Gen AI Agent. Goes beyond text to control Desktop and Android environments.
- **Status**: Completed (4 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/GNX-CLI
- **Stack**: Python, AI, CLI, Automation, Desktop Control, Android Control

### EduVid-LLM
- **Description**: A planning-centric architecture for automated educational video generation using LLMs.
- **Status**: Completed (4 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/EduVid-LLM
- **Stack**: Python, LLM, Planning, Video Generation, AI, Education

### Deep shell (dsh-shell)
- **Description**: Intelligent terminal combining chat with CLI to help users execute commands via natural language.
- **Status**: Completed (27 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/dsh-shell
- **Stack**: Python, CLI, System Programming, Shell, AI

### Robotics Arm Assistance (ARMv6)
- **Description**: Advanced robotics project utilizing computer vision (OpenCV) and LLMs for precise arm control.
- **Status**: Completed (13 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/ARMv6
- **Stack**: Python, OpenCV, Flask, Arduino, Robotics, AI

### ROS2-Arduino Servo Control
- **Description**: Precise robotic motion control using ROS2, Rviz, and Arduino integration.
- **Status**: Completed
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/ros2-arduino-servo
- **Stack**: ROS2, Arduino, Rviz, Robotics, C++, Simulation

### Interactive-2DOF-Arm-Sim
- **Description**: Interactive simulation of a 2-degree-of-freedom robotic arm for visualization and control.
- **Status**: Completed
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/Interactive-2DOF-Arm-Sim
- **Stack**: Python, Robotics, Simulation, Control Systems, Physics

### Portfolio-next
- **Description**: Modern, responsive portfolio built with Next.js and Framer Motion.
- **Status**: In Progress (4 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/portfolio-next
- **Stack**: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, TypeScript

### ArduinoSerial2
- **Description**: Python library for seamless serial communication with Arduino, featuring auto-detection.
- **Status**: Completed (3 Stars)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/ArduinoSerial2
- **Stack**: Python, Arduino, Serial Communication, PyPI

### Snake AI
- **Description**: Snake game implementation using reinforcement learning (PyTorch) to train autonomous agents.
- **Status**: Completed
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/gokul6350/SNAKE-AI
- **Stack**: Python, PyTorch, Reinforcement Learning, Neural Networks, AI
